item.description:
• Gödel, Escher, Bach: an Eternal Golden Braid (1979)
  • The Mind’s I: Fantasies and Reflections on Self and Soul (1981)

  • Surfaces and Essences: Analogy as the Fuel and Fire of Thinking (2011)
